page.title: 14LAW AND ORDER IN OAKLEY AREA
page.content: In the Oakley area the police station is made up of{1 police sergeant and 6 {police constables.}Two constables live in the area itself.Community policing ie.checking on the single pensioners in winter.The main problems are caused by teenagers,mainly{petty vandalism {and breach of the peace}although van- dalism is 33% down on the national average.The police try to spend time each year in{schools}talking to 12 year olds.They also take 2 schools in our area for orienteering.The police feel that this helps the relationship between the children and themselves.On average{there are 2-3 house break-ins {a week,}and in the past year(June-May) there have been 130.Most acts of van- dalism were done during the recent miners' dispute but no ill-feeling rests between the police and miners. Villagers and police relate very well.
